text:
Hello,

The following line in my httpd.conf file worked fine with version 2.0.36 of 
apache upwards, however now, having upgraded to version 2.0.39 i get an error 
message this version of apache is not suported using this dll. 

LoadModule php4_module "c:/program 
files/php4.2.2/experimental/apache2filter.dll"

AddType application/x-httpd-php .php


Please can you explain to me why this is and if it is meant to be like that, 
how do i load the PHP filters under this new version of apache. Id like to 
upgrade due to the security issue in the previous version but PHP support is 
essential.

My OS is win2k, using PHP v4.2.2 and Apache 2.0.39.

Thanks

Matt
creator: zebbedi@csi.com

text:
This is because there were API changes between 2.0.36 and 2.0.39 which require 
a new binary from PHP.  Check in with the PHP guys, I'm sure they'll be 
providing one soon if they haven't already.
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
